entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING ENDED, Bathurst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:29 AM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bathurst Airport 03:49 AM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure: 99.8 kPa
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 0.1°C
Wind: NW 13 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Rain mixed with freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain and snow changing to rain mixed with freezing rain this evening and ending before morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing near midnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast this evening. Wind becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle early in the morning. Showers beginning in the morning. Fog patches. Amount 2 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of drizzle or rain. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the evening and overnight. Fog patches dissipating in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023
